sqls.define: LogNo, MemberID, LogTime, ActionType, ActionObject, ActionObjectID, ActionObjectName, ModuleKey, PrjName, ClientName, IsDel, Remark
sqls.sql: INSERT INTO CSYS_Log (MemberID, LogTime, ActionType, ActionObject, ActionObjectID, ActionObjectName, ModuleKey, PrjName, ClientName, IsDel, Remark) VALUES (:MemberID, :LogTime, :ActionType, :ActionObject, :ActionObjectID, :ActionObjectName, :ModuleKey, :PrjName, :ClientName, :IsDel, :Remark)

UPDATE CSYS_Log SET MemberID=:MemberID, LogTime=:LogTime, ActionType=:ActionType, ActionObject=:ActionObject, ActionObjectID=:ActionObjectID, ActionObjectName=:ActionObjectName, ModuleKey=:ModuleKey, PrjName=:PrjName, ClientName=:ClientName, IsDel=:IsDel, Remark=:Remark WHERE LogNo=:LogNo
